sn55.55:1.1: “Mendicants, when four things are developed and cultivated they lead to the realization of the fruit of stream-entry.
sn55.55:1.3: Associating with true persons, listening to the true teaching, rational application of mind, and practicing in line with the teaching.
sn55.55:1.4: When these four things are developed and cultivated they lead to the realization of the fruit of stream-entry.”
